Package util

Class Score

java.lang.Object
util.Score
public class Score
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Brandon This score class is our way of determining how many points a word is worth

  • Method Details

    • calculate

      public static int calculate​(java.lang.String word, char[] letters)
      calculates how many points a word is worth. A correct word will earn one point. There is a penalty for entering a single letter. If the word is not found or if it not actually a word 0 will be returned. Scoring is based off of the pointsPerLetter function
      Parameters:
      word - - word to be scored
      letters - - legal given letters.txt
      Returns:
      - score of the word

    • onlyValidLetters

      private static boolean onlyValidLetters​(java.lang.String[] word, char[] letters)
      this checks if the input word uses valid letters.txt given by the game
      Parameters:
      word - - given word turned into a string
      letters - - legal letters.txt that can be used in the word
      Returns:
      - true or false on legality of word

    • pointsPerLetter

      private static int pointsPerLetter​(java.lang.String letter)
      This is a method that uses a switch statement to determine how many points each letter is worth
      Parameters:
      letter - - input letter to score
      Returns:
      - score of that letter
